statements: UPDATE biometric_templates SET template_data = 'updated_data' WHERE id = 1;

UPDATE BiometricTemplates SET template_data = <new_data> WHERE template_id = <id>
UPDATE AuthenticationLogs SET user_id = <new_user_id>, timestamp = <new_timestamp> WHERE log_id = <id>
